headline: Education:
texts: I graduated at Budapest University of Technologies and Economics.
My major was Computer Engineering, and my specialization was Data Science.

headline: Experience:
texts: [2022.feb - still working][BME-AUT Industry 4.0 Technology Centre] Computer Vision Engineer, Full Stack Developer - Junior
[2022.feb - 2023.feb][Freelance, marminalunk.com & some smaller projects] - Backend Developer

headline: Hobbies:
texts: In my spare time a like to learn new things, like a new image processing technique, a new database or some system designing concepts.
I played basketball for 13 years when I was young, and the love of the game remained in me. So I like to watch NBA games, analyze the data of the games and players.
I also like meeting with my friends, playing board games, camping or go to meetups.
